page.name: October DC Specials
page.description: <no description available>

page.name: Bloodfarer Cape I
page.description: The Bloodfarers were among the first sects of vampires to leave Safiria's watchful gaze. Rumors that they glittered in the moonlight are unfounded, but their ferocity and fashion sense were legendary.

page.name: Bloodfarer Visage I
page.description: Take on the visage of the legendary Bloodfarer vampire sect. While mostly known for their ferocity, it is rumored that the Bloodfarers placed great pride on personal appearance.

page.name: Radiant Shimmer
page.description: Shine with aura of brilliance! Allows you to empower yourself for 5 turns, at the cost of your Avoidance. (Aura is color custom to trim)

properties.name: Radiant Shimmer
properties.description: Shine with aura of brilliance! Allows you to empower yourself for 5 turns, at the cost of your Avoidance. (Aura is color custom to trim)

page.name: Scythe of the Unhallowed I
page.description: This scythe was wielded by the legendary Unhallowed Rider. The bright glow of this weapon was said to be the last thing many unwary travelers saw. But now it's yours... Has a chance to increase your Boost by 5 for 4 turns.
